mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date,'%m/%d') AS day,IFNULL(data.num, 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT @days := DATE_ADD(@days, INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AS date FROM (SELECT @days := DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY) FROM blog_access ) day WHERE DATE_FORMAT(@days, '%m/%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 29 DAY), '%m/%d') ORDER BY date ) dates LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS num, DATE(accessed_at) AS time FROM blog_access WHERE blog_address=#{blogAddress} AND DATE_FORMAT(accessed_at, '%m/%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY), '%m/%d %H:%i:%S') GROUP BY DATE(accessed_at) ) data ON DATE(time) = date ORDER BY date

SELECT blog_address as blogAddress, (select blog_name from blog_post p where p.blog_address=a.blog_address limit 1) as blogName, count(*) as accessCount FROM blog_access a WHERE date(accessed_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY blog_address ORDER BY accessCount DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT count(1) FROM blog_access WHERE link like concat(#{linkPrefix}, '%')
SELECT count(1) FROM blog_access WHERE link=#{link}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_access ( blog_address, link, ip, accessed_at ) VALUES ( #{blogAddress}, #{link}, #{ip}, now() )
